Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:惰

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+60F0

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 憜𢣖

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:惰

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+60F0

Main pronunciation 主要发音: duò

Other pronunciations 其它发音: duò,tuó

Original meaning 本义: Meaning careless.

English senses 英语理解: indolent, careless, lazy, idle

Usage example 用法举例: 懶惰 lǎn duò (lazy)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3157

Shuowen 说文解字: 憜或省**

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 憜 mutant 惰𢣖 from heart 忄 xīn and reduced phonetic Sui-dynasty 隋𨽋 suí-duò from related phonetic two-left-destroy 𢀡 huī-zuǒ simp 惰. (name- careless 憜惰𢣖 duò)

憜字的基本解释

憜
duò
古同“惰”。

憜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《廣韻》徒卧切，去過，定。］
［《廣韻》徒果切，上果，定。］
亦作“媠1”。亦作“憜1”。“隨2”的被通假字。
(1)懈怠；懒惰。
(2)指困乏。
(3)轻慢；不敬。
(4)衰败，败坏。

憜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憜； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页403第04
【集韻】同惰。

憜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憜字的起名意思

暂无。

Ruin
duò

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Guangyun" cuts only lying down, have been there, set. ]
["Guangyun" cut the fruit, set the fruit, set it. ]
Also known as "媠1". Also known as "憜1". "Sui 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Laziness; laziness.
(2) Refers to sleepiness.
(3) Reckless; disrespectful.
(4) Decay and corruption.

【Ji Yun】Same as laziness.
